usage.cn: 我只是个平凡的女人，感情也只贪个安稳
usage.eng: I'm just an ordinary women. i just ask stability for my sentiment.

usage.cn: 你们要求增加一万吨煤，我们将尽量满足你们。
usage.eng: We'll try our best to satisfy you with the additional 10,000 tons of coal as you asked.

usage.cn: 如果你向上天寻求帮助，说明你相信老天的能力。而如果上天不帮你，则意味着他也相信你的能力。
usage.eng: If you ask for God to help you, it means you trust His ability. If He doesn't help you yet, it means He trusts yours

usage.cn: 不去追逐你所渴求，你将永远不会拥有。不开口问，回答永远是No。不往前走，就将永远停留。
usage.eng: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
